content: Tin foil hats anyone? Dick Cheney is speaking his mind, nothing new. I doubt he cares what the Dems are saying. But all you people that can't get over the fact that he and Bush are out of office and not going to be prosecuted for ANYTHING. Come now guys, this is hate, nothing more. content: He's trying to save his own bacon. There's been a lot of press about the Bush administration and torture, the knives are slowly coming out - and among the guys near the top of the list are Cheney's chief of staff David Addington and John Yoo. This even sounds more likely when you look at how Poulson was appointed treasury guru right before everybody cleared out of the White House, and he threw nearly a Trillion Dollars in untraceable Golden Parachutes at everybody who had supported the Republicans for the last 8 years - - Wandering and Wondering
